location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'DIAGRAM LIGHTHOUSE ON THE RAS-UL-ARZ KOWEIT Scale = 1/96'

mods.abstract: The plan shows a diagram for a lighthouse on the Ras al Arz at Koweit [Kuwait]. The diagram gives the measurement in feet of the structure, the distance of the site of the lighthouse from a preexisting beacon, and bearings to the beacon, Shaikh Jabin's fort, a clump of trees and a a hill fort at Mishrif Sirra.
